thread.title: New Seychelles Cultural Ambassadors named during Creole Festival
thread.title_full: New Seychelles Cultural Ambassadors named during Creole Festival

author: eTN Editor
title: New Seychelles Cultural Ambassadors named during Creole Festival
text:
Promoting cultural tourism New Seychelles Cultural Ambassadors named during Creole Festival 
Two more Cultural Ambassadors for Seychelles were named this morning by Minister Alain St.Ange, the Seychelles Minister responsible for Tourism and Culture, at an event at the Gallery at the Carrefour des Arts in Victoria. The ceremony that took place in the presence of PS Benjamine Rose. the PS for Culture; Jimmy Savy, the CEO of the National Arts Council; High Commissioner of Great Britain; and Ambassadors of France and Russia; as well as members of the art community and students accompanied by their teachers. 
Manfredi Lefebvre d'Ovidio, the President of the Silversea Cruises, and Marclane Antoine, a cultural personality from Mauritius with a long association with the music world of Seychelles, were both named Cultural Ambassadors of Seychelles on the eve of the Official Opening Ceremony of the island's Creole Festival which is marking its 30th anniversary this year. 
When he was addressing the gathering before presenting Mr. Manfredi Lefebvre d'Ovidio and Mr. Marclane Antoine their Certificate of Appointment, Minister Alain St.Ange explained that personalities who understood the Seychelles culture and who appreciated this unique culture of Seychelles were appointed to help the Culture Department of the islands in its continued mission to help the Seychelles world of culture consolidate itself and also break into the outside world. Minister St.Ange thanked Mr. Manfredi Lefebvre d'Ovidio, the President of the Silversea Cruises, and Mr. Marclane Antoine for their love of Seychelles, for their friendship, and for accepting to serve Seychelles as Cultural Ambassadors. 
Seychelles is a founding member of the International Coalition of Tourism Partners (ICTP) . For more information on Seychelles Minister of Tourism and Culture Alain St.Ange, click here . Oct 23, 2015 Source: Seychelles Ministry of Tourism and Culture
